pairs.sentence_a: Person A carried the lumber bundles from the truck.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B made several trips carrying individual lumber pieces.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A broke through the wall during the rescue operation.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B called emergency services about the wall.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A held the tarp down during the hurricane winds.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B needed help from three others holding the tarp.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A lifted the concrete mixer components into position.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B used equipment to lift the concrete mixer components.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A pulled the stuck propeller free from the weeds.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B called a mechanic about the stuck propeller.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A carried the camping gear for the entire group.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B carried only their own gear up the trail.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A broke the rusted pipe free from its fittings.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B needed pipe wrenches and leverage to free the pipe.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A held the tool steady while others worked.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B asked someone to hold the equipment.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A lifted the steel beams onto the framework.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B operated the machinery that lifted the beams.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A pulled the sled loaded with supplies across the ice.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B pulled the empty sled across the ice.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A carried the injured hiker's backpack plus their own.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B carried only their own backpack up the trail.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A broke the rock formations blocking the cave entrance.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B searched for an alternate route around the rocks.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A held the stretcher steady across uneven ground.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B needed frequent breaks while carrying the stretcher.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A lifted the air conditioning unit to the second floor.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B hired installers for the air conditioning unit.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A pulled the boat trailer up the steep ramp.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B needed assistance pulling the trailer up the ramp.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A carried the grain sacks to the storage barn.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B made multiple trips with smaller sacks.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A broke the jammed mechanism free with force.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B called maintenance about the jammed mechanism.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A held the defensive line against the opposing team.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B was pushed back by the opposing team.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A lifted the fallen rider and horse to safety.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B helped the fallen rider stand up.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A pulled the nets from the deep water.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B used the winch to pull the nets up.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A carried the roofing materials up the ladder repeatedly.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B had materials delivered directly to the roof.

pairs.sentence_a: Person A broke through the packed snow drift blocking the door.
pairs.sentence_b: Person B shoveled gradually at the snow drift for thirty minutes.
